#Text=Own a Dog
#Text=Okay , so you read all the interesting and important facts about your dog 's breed or maybe you have n't , but either way , you 're still clueless on what to do to provide for a dog .
#Text=You do n't want Fido to live unhappily , right ?
#Text=Here are the basic steps !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Give your dog a name .
#Text=This is something that will affect your pet for life .
#Text=Do n't name it something too long or something that you do n't like .
#Text=Do n't name her Kitty just because your sister made you for revenge on not getting a family cat !
#Text=It 's important that your dog has a nice name for tags and a word to respond to when he or she gets lost .
#Text=Designate an area for your dog to sleep .
#Text=The first night must always be prepared with one simple question : Where do they sleep ?
#Text=Will they sleep in a dog bed in your room or in the garage ?
#Text=Or maybe the backyard ?
#Text=Wherever it may be , make sure it 's warm during the winter and cool during the summer so they can sleep comfortably .
#Text=Make it protected from possible dangers and the possibility of escaping .
#Text=Pick a dog food for your friendly friend ! Make sure not to feed it chicken and leftovers as a daily meal .
#Text=They are unhealthy and can lead to obesity or diabetes , and we do n't want unnecessary vet bills to pile up .
#Text=Make sure your dog has a source of water available at all time .
#Text=Put two water bowls available : In your backyard and in your house .
#Text=They need something to drink out of .
#Text=Pick a specific spot to place the bowl .
#Text=Make sure it is refilled with fresh , cool water daily .
#Text=Do n't move the bowl to a new spot everyday , that can cause confusion to your dog .
#Text=If your dog knows the bowl is in one spot , he 'll know it 's there for him when he needs it .
#Text=Provide playtime for your pet .
#Text=Each day you should designate at least one hour of playtime , let it be day or night , rain or shine .
#Text=Exercise can mean many things considering the size of your dog .
#Text=A medium sized dog could do just fine with a 20 minute walk and some throw toys .
#Text=A small dog could be happy with a 30 minute game of fetch and a short walk .
#Text=A large dog will probably need a long walk , a game of fetch , and some chew toys .
#Text=Please provide playtime for your dog at least once a day .
#Text=Do n't forget or be too lazy .
#Text=It only makes your dog unhappy .
#Text=Give them a collar and tags .
#Text=At your local pet store there should be a machine that provides pet tags for your dog .
#Text=All dogs need a collar and tags to go on it .
#Text=All the tag should say is the dog 's name and an email or phone number to call if they are lost .
#Text=If you think this step is not important , do your research !
#Text=As smart as your dog might seem to be , curiosity can overcome the voice in your dog 's head that tells them " No , do n't do it " .
#Text=Dogs will get loose at some point in their life , and with no tags there is no one to figure out who their owner is .
#Text=You will be saving your dogs physical and mental wellness by getting them tags .
#Text=Microchips cannot be seen and plenty of people do n't look for it or get the stray scanned for one- they only look for what 's visible .
#Text=So the tags are extremely important and should be taken care of right away .
#Text=Vet checkups .
#Text=If you ca n't afford a monthly checkup , at least do it every so often .
#Text=Even if it 's just once , make sure you can do it .
#Text=Give them their shots and make sure they are healthy .
#Text=If you see any signs of illness , report to a vet immediately to make sure your furry friend is not in pain !
#Text=Warnings
#Text=No dog is born aggressive but depended on how you treat them they can become angry and possibly bite
#Text=Dogs will die eventually so remember to enjoy the short amount of time you have with them !
#Text=Some dog foods can have harmful ingredients to your dog .
#Text=These you should avoid these where possible
#Text=They might be only part of your life but you are their whole life , their only friend .
#Text=Just be kind to them !
